# Support Policy

## Introduction

Welcome to **Conclave of the Noble Souls** support hub! Whether you're a member of our community, a contributor, or a first-time visitor, we're here to provide you with the assistance and resources you need to have a smooth experience with our project.

Our goal is to ensure that you have all the tools, guidance, and support necessary to fully engage with our platform and contribute to its growth.

---

## Getting Help

If you need help or have questions, we offer several ways to get assistance. Please read through the following options to find the most efficient route for your needs.

### 1. **GitHub Issues**

The first place to seek support is by browsing and searching our **GitHub Issues** section. We maintain a well-organized repository of bug reports, feature requests, and other issues. If you have encountered a bug or need assistance, **please create a new issue** or add a comment to an existing one.

- **Bug Report**: If you’ve encountered a bug, please ensure that you fill out the [Bug Report Template](.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/bug_report.md) with as much detail as possible (steps to reproduce, expected results, etc.).
- **Feature Request**: If you have an idea for a new feature, please follow the [Feature Request Template](.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/feature_request.md).
- **General Questions**: For general inquiries, please refer to the [General Question Template](.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/general_question.md).

---

### 2. **Discord Community**

Join our vibrant community on **Discord** for real-time assistance, discussions, and collaborations. Our community is full of passionate members who are happy to help and share their knowledge.

- **Support Channel**: Open a **ticket** channel for quick, informal support from other community members and moderators.
- **General Chat**: Join the **lounge** for casual discussions, ideas, and friendly conversation.

Our moderators are available in the Discord server to provide further guidance and escalate any issues that require deeper attention.

[Join our Discord](https://discord.gg/pbTnTxqS38)

---

### 3. **Contacting Support**

If you cannot find the help you need through GitHub Issues or the Discord server, please contact us directly through email at [kundansmishra@gmail.com](mailto:kundansmishra@gmail.com). Our support team will respond to your inquiry as quickly as possible.

Please include the following details when contacting support:

- A clear description of your issue or question
- Screenshots or error messages, if applicable
- Steps you’ve already taken to resolve the issue (e.g., searching the issues, checking the docs)

---

## Contributing to the Project

We welcome contributions to **Conclave of the Noble Souls**. If you’re interested in helping improve the platform, whether through bug fixes, new features, or documentation, here’s how you can get started:

1. **Fork the Repository**: Create your own copy of the project so you can make changes without affecting the main repository.
2. **Create a Branch**: Always create a new branch from the `master` branch to implement your changes.
3. **Submit a Pull Request**: Once your changes are ready, submit a pull request to the `master` branch. Please follow our [PR Template](.github/PULL_REQUEST_TEMPLATE.md) and ensure your PR passes our automated tests.
4. **Contributing Guidelines**: Be sure to read our [Contributing Guide](CONTRIBUTING.md) for details on our code standards, processes, and best practices.

---

## Support Channels

- **[GitHub Discussions](https://github.com/Hemansh-X797/Conclave-Of-The-Noble-Souls-Website/discussions)**: Use Discussions for general project inquiries, feature suggestions, and long-term roadmap conversations.
- **[Email Support](mailto:kundansmishra@gmail.com)**: For in-depth support or urgent issues.

---

## Support Best Practices

To ensure a smooth experience, please adhere to the following when seeking help:

- **Be clear and concise**: Clearly describe the issue, providing detailed steps to reproduce if applicable.
- **Respect others**: Be courteous and respectful to everyone, whether on GitHub, Discord, or through email.
- **Provide feedback**: We always appreciate your input! Let us know what’s working well, what can be improved, and any suggestions you have for the future.

---

## How You Can Help

If you find this project useful, here are some ways you can contribute:

- **Donate**: Consider becoming a sponsor or donor via [GitHub Sponsors](https://github.com/sponsors/Hemansh-X797).
- **Spread the Word**: Share this project with your network, on social media, and in relevant communities.
- **Contribute Code**: Help us improve by submitting bug fixes, features, or documentation changes.

---

## Acknowledgements

Thank you to all of our users, contributors, and supporters. Your contributions make this project better every day. Together, we are building a robust and secure platform for everyone to enjoy.

Thank you for being part of **Conclave of the Noble Souls**!
